description:
It took many years for a major Halo adaptation to get off the ground. It finally happened in the form of 2022’s Halo TV series on Paramount Plus, which was followed by a second season earlier this year. However, the series was canceled soon after with only two seasons under its belt. Now a newly-surfaced [...]

title: Christopher Nolan Reportedly Interested In Purchasing ‘Halo’ TV Series Rights

description:
A number of Netflix subscribers are sharing a new reason to want to cancel their Netflix subscriptions with the newest “#CancelNetflix” boycott. This time, however, these subscribers want to do so because Netflix chairman Reed Hastings donated to the ongoing Kamala Harris campaign. It’s been stated that the donation contributed by Hastings is actually “the [...]

The post Cancel Netflix Boycott Sparked By Kamala Harris Campaign Donation By Netflix Chairman appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Cancel Netflix Boycott Sparked By Kamala Harris Campaign Donation By Netflix Chairman
